titles.title: Unlocking our Domestic LNG Potential Act of 2020
To repeal restrictions on the export and import of natural gas.
Unlocking our Domestic LNG Potential Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Unlocking Our Domestic LNG Potential Act of 2020
This bill grants the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission the authority to approve or deny applications for facilities, such as Liquefied Natural Gas terminals, to export natural gas from the United States to foreign countries or import natural gas from foreign countries.
